title: Lissandra Voice Bug? [GAMEPLAY]
body: Just played a game of Lissandra and I was able to keep spamming the voice commands without her finishing what she was saying. This bug must of happened today as it wasn't doing it yesterday. Anyone else found this?

replies.body:
*I-I-I-I've been killing your kind for centuries.~* {{champion:127}} 

Spamming VO is something that occurs on several champions - we're okay with how it's currently functioning. :)
its not a bug its a feature, a lot of champs audio is link to the start of the animation so they reset when you use the action repeatedly

This happens with a lot of skins for different champions; I think also with lissandra's base skin.

But it's totally awesome and should not be changed.
